MathNet.Numerics.Distributions.StudentsTDistribution Class Reference

Provides generation of student's t-distributed random numbers. More...

Properties

override RandomSource RandomSource [get, set]
 Gets or sets a RandomSource object that can be used as underlying random number generator.
int DegreesOfFreedom [get, set]
 Gets or sets the degrees of freedom (nu) parameter.
override double Minimum [get]
 Gets the minimum possible value of generated random numbers.
override double Maximum [get]
 Gets the maximum possible value of generated random numbers.
override double Mean [get]
 Gets the mean value of generated random numbers. Throws NotSupportedException if DegreesOfFreedom <= 2, since the value is not defined in this case.
override double Median [get]
 Gets the median of generated random numbers.
override double Variance [get]
 Gets the variance of generated random numbers. Throws NotSupportedException if DegreesOfFreedom <= 3, since the value is not defined in this case.
override double Skewness [get]
 Gets the skewness of generated random numbers. Throws NotSupportedException if DegreesOfFreedom <= 4, since the value is not defined in this case.

Detailed Description

Provides generation of student's t-distributed random numbers.

The implementation of the StudentsTDistribution type bases upon information presented on Wikipedia - Student's t-distribution
